title: UGANDA Soccer Tee
content:
I've been curious for this one, especially for the uppercase A.  
I can't tell if it's custom or not, only thing I know is that the design is from 2002.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [uganda.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109011044/http:/typophile.com/files/uganda.gif) | 123.82 KB |
author: Gregory Cadars

comments.content: I've been looking for every known grotesque in the world… still no idea where this "A" comes from…
